4212.title: Before a Yawning Pit
4212.description:
You have set foot on desecrated ground, and it is likely that you will pay
for your trespass with your pitiful life.  All around you the earth has been
scorched and charred, as if hell itself opened up and formed a perfect rift
to populate with its denizens. Beyond the droning hum of insects, you can
make out an occasional scream. Smoke and ash plumes drift from the ground,
causing eye irritation. All around the pit small totems bearing the likeness
of foul beings have been erected.  They seem to be glaring in your direction.
The longer you remain, the more uncomfortable you become as the smell of blood
mixed with burning flesh assaults your olfactory senses with unabated force.
A vile place indeed lurks before you, and your senses advise you to turn back.

up.description: You can climb to the surface above.

4213.title: Bottom of the Pit
4213.description:
You stand in the massive center of a scorched pit in the earth. Wisps of hazy
smoke rise up from the hot surface of the pit, and the smell of sulfur and
burnt flesh is very strong here.  From cracks in the earth squirm and crawl
a horde of the most unpleasant insects Thera has seen: scarab dung beetles,
centipedes, cockroaches, scorpions, and pincer insects.  They meander the
scorched earth in search of prey to overwhelm and devour. There appear to be
no other signs of life nearby but you can sense that arched tunnels have been
carved roughly into the earth here to provide passage. To access the tunnels,
however, you must first pass through burning archways.  The source of the
flames is unknown, but it seems as though to proceed further in this foul
place, you must be willing to endure hardship and suffering.  Looking up,
a rabid swarm of insects swarms over the pit, deterring would-be intruders.

north.description: The veil of smoke and ash is too thick for your eyes to penetrate.

east.description: The veil of smoke and ash is too thick for your eyes to penetrate.

south.description: The veil of smoke and ash is too thick for your eyes to penetrate.

west.description: The veil of smoke and ash is too thick for your eyes to penetrate.

up.description: You sense a hazy shaft of light above.

4214.title: Under a Burning Archway
4214.description:
You are beneath a wide tunnel carved deep into the scorched earth. The arched
ceiling is well over twenty feet above your head, yet the heat of the flames
is already causing you to break a heavy sweat. Judging by the look of things
the burning arch is nearly ten feet wide, and it's unclear just how the fire
continues to burn without any sort of obvious fuel.  It must be some source
of infernal power.  The swarms of insects seem to avoid these archways, as
their thick and lacquered carapaces cannot withstand the intense heat of
the hellfire. You feel the urge to move quickly lest the ever burning arch
of infernal flames surges out to incinerate you.

north.description: The yawning center of the pit calls out.

south.description: You can make out a charred tunnel in the distance.

4215.title: Within a Charred Tunnel
4215.description:
The subterranean tunnel that has been excavated in the earth here appears as
though it was created through otherworldly means.  The walls are scorched and
etched, in some places even glassy looking as the ground has crystallized into
obsidian from some unknown force.  Everything is hot to the touch, and acrid
sulfuric fume wisps waft from every surface.  Strange and disturbing looking
insects you have never seen before scurry about in search of a fresh and hot
meal. The sight of them is enough to turn your stomach. Your vision is then
directed in two places: back toward a burning archway and deeper into the
tunnel, where it abruptly ends in a cave filled with blood and gore.

north.description: The veil of smoke and ash is too thick for your eyes to penetrate.

west.description: A blood-filled cave filled with torture devices awaits.

4216.title: The Torture Wing
4216.description:
At the center of this blackened out cave is a bizarre sight. A bubbling and
oozing unnatural "spring" of crimson blood surges forth, swallowing up the
cave surface.  Bloody footprints from all manner of foul creatures have been
tracked across the floor, leading to and from an array of despicable torture
devices. Strangely, there is no evidence of any insects or critters within
this place, as if some dark force has prhobited their presence here. Blackened
iron torches hang from sconces in the wall, flickering in an eerie fashion
that causes the shadows to dance with glee at the horrid suffering that
takes place here. Only the most depraved souls in all of Thera could possibly
stomach spending more than an instant in this unholy place before losing their
lunch...and any sense of hope and humanity.

east.description: A charred tunnel leads out of here.

east.description: The yawning center of the pit calls out.

west.description: A fiery passage way lies ahead.

4218.title: A Fiery Passage
4218.description:
You stand in the midst of a wide orange-glowing tunnel. Flames dance and
lick at your extremities with tempered restraint, as if some dark and foul
host wishes you only slightly roasted before enjoying you as an entire meal
in the not too distant future.  You might find such a fate if you continue
through this passage to the north.

north.description: Thrums of negative energy emanating from this room set your hair hair on end.

east.description: The veil of smoke and ash is too thick for your eyes to penetrate.

4219.title: A Very Unholy Place
4219.description:
Unholy runes adorn every inch of the charred and blackened walls of this
despicable cave. Pulses of negative energy from the nether planes erupt
from a column of black-orange lava that flows from ceiling-to-floor in
a haphazard fashion causing the swarms of insects crawling around the room
to almost dance and gyrate in a disturbing fashion. A dull hum emanates
from the lava pillar, setting your pulse racing and causing your breathing
to become shallow and difficult. Once in a while, flashes of red and orange
light burst out from the unholy runes, fueled with negative energies that
draw their origin from the center of the lava column. It would be unwise to
linger here long.

south.description: A fiery passage is your only exit from this room.

north.description: You sense a charred tunnel lies ahead.

east.description: A blackened cave filled with bizarre totems is just ahead.

south.description: The veil of smoke and ash is too thick for your eyes to penetrate.

4222.title: The Totem Cave
4222.description:
This subterranean cave is different from the rest of the Temple of Darkness.
A cold wind blows, despite the molten heat from geothermal energies. Various
relics and totems have been erected all around the room, taking the visages
of creatures both animal and demonic. The totems have all been inscribed with
unholy runes, and their eyes fixate upon you as you move about the chamber.
Horrifying insects of all shapes and sizes undulate and crawl about the cave
in search of fresh meat, sending shivers down your spine.  Meanwhile, the
Totems have taken note of you and if you stare at them long enough, their
expressions and positions seem to change and warp. What this means, only
the Depraved truly know.

west.description: A charred tunnel leads out of here.

east.description: A darkened tunnel leads deeper into the Temple.

west.description: The yawning center of the pit calls out.

4224.title: A Dark Tunnel
4224.description:
This tunnel is surprisingly nondescript and apparently not often used based
on the lack of evidence of foot traffic. A single torch hangs in an iron
sconce on the wall, but given the lack of oxygen available, all that is
visible is a dim blue flame that casts off almost no light at all. With
little else to look at here, you can return back to the archway and risk
a dance with flames, or toward a secluded large cave to the south.

south.description: The tunnel ends abruptly in a large, but cold dark cave.

west.description: The veil of smoke and ash is too thick for your eyes to penetrate.

4225.title: The Cavern of Recuperation
4225.description:
Runes line the walls and floor of this dark cavern as they do the others, with
one small exception.  The runes appear to be both unholy and holy in origin,
leading one to wonder just exactly what kind of warped deeds take place in
this place.  At the center of the cavern is a large runic circle, covered in
both shapes and figures.  Standing in its midst is a large hooded figure, who
looks like he or she...or it?  is not to be trifled with.

north.description: A dark tunnel leads out of this cave.
